bibdata.title: IEEE/NEMI Low-Cost Open Architecture Controller Specification
IEEE/NEMI Low-Cost Open Architecture Controller Specification

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The following topics are dealt with: controller management; motion control; events, states and I/O; exception handling; nodes, frames and attributes; position and orientation; mechanism parameters; and axis parameters.
